## NodeMatch type

Utility type for matching the name of a node to via a string or function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NodeMatch<GSchema extends EditorSchema = any> = string | ((name: string, node: ProsemirrorNode<GSchema>) => boolean) | RegexTuple;
```
